name: Smile
intro: "Smile" is a song by Canadian recording artist Avril Lavigne, written by Lavigne with Max Martin and Shellback, and produced by Martin and Shellback. "Smile" was released on April 11, 2011 to Australian radio stations as the second single from her fourth album Goodbye Lullaby.

songs.name: Smile (Super Clean Version, No sxxt, fxxxing, bxxch)
